passage.title: Every one is good
passage.paragraph: "George," says his mother, "Please go to the shop and buy some eggs. But be careful, don't choose any bad ones."
Half an hour later George comes back with a yellow plastic basket. His mother takes the basket and looks inside. "Oh," she says, "what is it?"
"Eggs, of course!" George says, "I break them all. No one is bad."
